Blog.post: Today, the stupid nuisance call was made again.. i got no choice but to call dear dear help me settle it.. then actually want to ignore dear dear for three days but end up went back with him again.. stupid lah.. what am i trying to do ma.. hai... then we talk, planned to eat sweasens after my poa test at jurong point... wanted to make him spend money to bu hui what he did to me yesterday... haha.. then i also made him talk to me all the way through my journey to school... i didn't eat anything since morning nine o'clock... hungry but kinda of happy that we went back to normal self... hee... then i change, went to school... waited quite long for the bus to arrive... haha.. then i met Xylia at the bus stop at Jalan Toa Payoh.. just then, received a call for Nancy auntie, my tuition kid's mother... she give me a cheque which wrote 5 sept.. wow liao.. two weeks from now lei.. then she apologise about the mistake and asked me to go find her at her work place to take cash.. okay lor... money more important ma... haha.. then i switch over to dear dear side, telling him the bad news.. maybe it is a good new to him cause he save money over no need to treat me eat Sweasen but i won't just let it go... I will still want to eat it on Wednesday... i end my paper at 12.40pm on wednesday... hee.. kinda of early... moreover he don't have school on that day.. hee.. then i said bye to dear, hung up, went to talk to Xylia, about how she and her bf... hai.. sad that they ended.. she looked very pale... think cried and sad ba... Then bus arrived, we went up, she saw her classmate, went to sit with them, then left me alone... thus, i went to call dear dear... disturb him... hee.. then he accompanied me talk for nearly 21 minutes til i reached school... then i went to canteen 2 to find my classmates... they are having their lunch.. took a few minute before i managed to find them... then i sat down, they were discussing about macro stuff.. then i went to buy my lunch... had chicken rice.. not bad lah.. when i took the plate back to the sit, they were like, "why you never take the soup, very nice lei.. should try, even if you don't wan, i help you drink la.." oh my god... just soup.. i don't like to drink those MSG soup... not healthy.. hai... today is my dunno how many days of toothache.. i ate very slow then Shirleen happen to notice it... asked me what happen.. then everyone started to discuss about teeth... wisdom teeth... Liling even said that those who has their wisdom teeth at the later stage of their life are those who are smart... then Vian said that " then i'm very stupid lor, cos i have mine when i'm primary school' oh my god.. why bother and be so "mi xing" hai.. then we went to exam... haha... liling, mei shih and me went to carry the fan to put near us, cause the weather is damn hot.. haha.. first time do such a lame thing.. funny sia.. haha.. then exam finish.. i rushed down to Istan Scott.. got my money.. went to coffee bean buy my favourite Ultimate drink then went to my counter, get xiao yin to help me take my pouch card from the security area.. then i went up to find Ruth, my manager.. hee.. coincidence that i saw my boss at Suzuya too.. haha.. then we chat.. asked Ruth to issue me my this month cheque first.. need money for chalet, buy present for my dear dear.. then i went drop my cheque, go see perfume to buy for dear dear... got hugo boss perfume.. get the friend there to help me take staff purchase.. then he said can pass it to me on thursday.. ya.. coming to orchard with dear dear for shopping on thursday.. his birthday.. hee.. spend alot today.. then i went back to my counter, sadly xiao yin went for dinner so i decided to go home.. ya lor.. then call dear dear.. told him that i got him perfume.. but he seem to be not happy with it.. he asked for it.. i got him.. but why he not happy.. sob sob.. what should i do to make him happy then.. ya lor.. got home, hee.. what to do.. sleep lah.. i slept til 6.30pm.. then wake up, took a bath, ate my dinner and went tuition... not bad.. got another 170 from tuition cause today is the eighth lesson... haha.. then as i went out of the door, notice that my primary school mate is teaching my tuition kid's landlord's son... haha.. coincidence sia.. but this little boy, thought last week is another tuition teacher? why keep changing.. haha.. went to put in the money to my bank.. and also talking to tracy on the phone.. she was telling that she wanted to work part-time but then she really funny.. got parents support don't want.. she rather work.. cause she think not enough from parents and bored at home.. such good lifestyle, she don't want, i despo for it man.. can have more sleeping time.. then i saw a ex-colleague at the market.. she is an ah lian, always put thick thick make up and then me and my friends always said that if one day, we go and hit her hand, the makeup powder will crack.. cause too thick le.. she is drinking with her bf.. hai.. another one, keep changing bf.. dunno lah.. not my business.. haha.. then went home.. watch tv for a while.. online.. try to do online revision question for POA but dun understand what the heck the question is asking.. give up.. now typing.. wow.. confirm today post very long.. haha.. ok lah.. end here le..

two hour ago, i had a quarrel with dear dear.. i make up a decision that i will leave for 3 days.. hai.. i don't know.. i got a uneven feeling.. i tried to continue my study but i knew that i can't concentrate.. i don't know.. this is not my usual self.. though i can stand up and face the fact.. be strong but why am i so weak now.. no longer the same as last time.. hai.. hopefully tomorrow morning, i will have a better mind to study again and go for my macroeconomics common test 1 in the afternoon.. though it is a true or false questions but still worried.. it's natural.. maybe in order to get good result and to maintain this relationship, whenever i have test or exam, i need to stay away from dear dear to let myself have a worry-free mind to study for exam.. dear dear, though i miss you but then, i got to act as if i don't.. you are so mean to me, i should be mean to you back.. idea of disappearing away from you forever come into my mind just now.. but i dunno.. should i or not.. i even think that friday night, wait til you sleep soundly le, sneek out of the chalet.. let you be alone to celebrate your birthday.. i dunno.. i'm badly hurt.. you really did try to control your temper but at the last moment, you just shouted at me.. scolded me.. it hurtful... very hurtful... in this relationship, this is the first time, i have my boyfriend scream at me on the phone.. no one have ever did that to me.. i don't know.. i only know that during this past few years.. only when i throw temper on my boyfriend, i scream at them.. nobody dare to scream at me.. you are the first person that i tolerate this kind.. badly hurt.. from the start.. it seem that you and i have used each other as a replacement for the one that we loved but can't be together.. now that i had put all my love for you.. you haven't really got over with her totally.. i'm very upset.. you find Y.S. as your consultant but to me.. do you see me go for any guy or girls.. i dun really.. yes, i ever do consult maggie and jiayan for help when we quarrel.. but the rest of the time.. i'm all alone to take all the pain myself.. but you go for Y.S. as your consultant.. i'm jealous.. all along, i have a great jealousy toward any girls that get close to my guy.. never will i allow my guy to talk or be close to another girl.. i'm possessive.. by nature.. i'm ya.. that me... who is not possessive.. Y.S. can say that i'm a good gf to you cos i'm brave to fight for my love but i feel that when she say this to you, she is trying to make you feel happy.. that what i feel in my place as a gf.. cause she is my enemy.. i'm childish... but that me.. i'm 17... ya.. i can be mature sometime as you said.. but at times, i will still go back to my old self, my age.. sorry.. i love you.. that why i possessive... if i dun love you, why would i care so much.. that kind of kpo to know who you with and will not stop you from been close with them de.. maybe i really need to be more understanding.. to stand at your view to interpret thing.. i will try to learn to be.. hopefully, one days, we can be the happiest couple.. Love You Dear JER..

Today I was late for my tuition... reaching my tuition kid's house, thinking that today i would be getting my tuition fee.. $200 but end up after the tuition then i found out the cheque date written 5 sept... wow liao... still got two weeks then can get my money... why like that one... how can you treat me like this.. i need money for my allowance and my dear dear chalet.. why can't it be cash... sian diao.. then i went to clementi interchange to buy lor lame with rice for dear dear to eat for his lunch.. i hadn't eaten for that day except a packet of milk.. firstly, my back tooth is growing.. i had been suffering for the past 3 days.. Pain!! sob sob.. after buying, i took 99 to jurong shopping center to bring lunch for my dear dear... upon reaching there, he was busy with his stuff... didn't even bother about me while i stood outside the shop waiting impatiently for him to finish his stuff.. he finally opened the door for me, took the lunch from me and asked me to go home.. i was so pissed off at that moment, luckily the uncle asked me in and gave me a chair to sit so that i got place to eat my lunch too... i'm currently on diet so i only ate fried banana for my lunch, before that i bought a cup of watermelon with lemon juice when i was on my way from clementi interchange.. then sat inside the shop to eat with him.. stupid jer, didn't appreciate me for been so nice to send him food.. not a thanks from him.. sob sob.. swear this will be the first and last time cause i didn't like the idea that his ex-gf, lynn bought the same food for him before.. so i don't like to be replacement.. thus, i can buy other food but not that food again.. hee.. i'm stubborn.. don't like to be the same.. then i sat there, chatting with dear dear and uncle jimmy.. ya... even went to buy toto and 4D for them and myself.. just now check on the 4D, dear dear nearly win.. he bought 8717, but it came out 8787. If he had just guess my year then he will win.. why guess my year and age together.. hai.. no faith with the 5 thousand.. hopefully toto can win... a few hundred also not bad.. hee.. uncle jimmy insisted that i had to stay until 5.30 then can let me off.. by then, it's late and i'm tired cause yesterday slept at 4 plus and woke up today at early 8 plus for tuition.. i took a cab home though i knew it's a waste of money.. the stupid driver, only asked him one question and he kept continued to talk to me, i just hoped to catch some rest ma.. but he didn't wish me to do so.. hai.. sob sob.. reached home at 5.50.. i immediately went to sleep.. halfway, i heard that my sister and her family had arrived.. i don't bother about them, though i heard that my nephew tried to open my door, but didn't manage to do so.. heng.. but unluckily, he was so pathetic noisy, made me so pissed off that i got up, opened the door and shouted, can you remain silent and shut the door.. i could see that my sister was terrified by my action.. mum told her that i was so tired.. just reached home, wanting to get some sleep.. but didn't manage to sleep better, i woke up shortly to eat my dinner.. i was having the same stuff as my nephew and niece.. guess what.. porridge.. cause my tooth ache.. argh.. seem like baby food.. haha... time passes very fast... 9 plus le.. then they went home... i was now online.. later going to study my macroeconomic.. tomorrow.. first test in poly... wonder how will it be like... hee... must get as many AD as possible.. i want to get one thousand dollar scholarship.. hee.. this is my aim.. money money.. can't help it... i'm a very calculative person since young.. that make me perfect in my maths.. hee.. sorry.. a bit thick skin.. hee.. shall end here... continue tomorrow.. hee..
